post:
Hi the Lowendtalk community,

Firstheberg is celebrating the summer with two good deals !

The first one, we offer 10 to 50% off on your first order for the rent of a dedicated server INTEL ATOM 4GB Ram & 1x64 GB SSD or 2x500 GB HDD 

Our Dedicated servers are in the North of France. 

Discount price on : https://www.firstheberg.com/serveur-dedie-intel-atom
10% OFF with the code "littlesummer" on a rent 1 month
30% OFF with the code "mediumsummer" on a rent 3 or 6 months
50% OFF with the code "bigsummer" on a rent 12 month

Then, we offer 30% off on the first order on our VPS GP 1, GP 2 and GP 3, more informations here :  https://www.firstheberg.com/virtual-private-server

30% OFF with the code : "VPSGP30SSD"

Code availables on the first order.

Our website is not in english, you can use google chrome translate if you need to translate it.

Hope you will enjoy it and don't hesitate to answer for more details.
